information.name: routeros-suspension
information.description: Plugin for handling suspension on RouterOS devices.
information.author: Ubiquiti Inc.

configuration.label: UNMS API token
configuration.description: API token created for this plugin in Network section of UNMS

configuration.label: IP Address
configuration.description: IP address of Mikrotik gateway. For more gateways you can use multiple configuration values in IP Address, User name and Password fields. Just put each value on a new line. The number and order of rows must be consistent in all filled fields.
